info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 7:17PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Catawba, southwestern Alexander, southeastern Caldwell and eastern Burke Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 716 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hickory, or near Longview, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hickory, St. Stephens, Longview, Bethlehem, Hildebran, Hickory Regional Airport, Lake Hickory, Mountain View, Icard and Conover. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
